Armor.name: Envy of the Master
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +6 enhancement bonus to Intelligence, a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom, a +4 armor bonus to AC and the ability to cast prediction of failure spell once per day.

Armor.name: Dark Master's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +8 enhancement bonus to Intelligence and Charisma, a +5 bonus on all concentration checks, and a +10 competence bonus to Knowledge: arcana skill checks.

Armor.name: Prankster's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +4 deflection bonus to AC, a +2 luck bonus to all saving throws and the ability to cast blindness spell twice per day.

Armor.name: Robe of Eyes
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +10 armor enhancement bonus to Perception and the effects of the Uncanny Dodge feat. It also inflicts a -4 penalty to saving throws against gaze attacks and blindness.

Armor.name: Integrity
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +3 resistance bonus on Will, Fortitude, and Reflex saving throws and the ability to cast blindness spell once per day.

Armor.name: Ambrosial Attire of Arcane Annihilation
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +4 bonus to attack rolls with ray attacks, +1 damage per dice to fire, acid, force, cold, electicity spells, and a +4 bonus to spell penetration.

Armor.name: Draping Veil of Prowess
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer electricity resistance 10, cold resistance 10, a +2 deflection bonus to AC and the ability to cast enlarge person spell once per day.

Armor.name: Robe of True Master
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +5 deflection bonus to AC, Spell Resistance 18, +4 resistance bonus to all saving throws, and +2 bous to spell penetration.

Armor.name: Dark Acolyte's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +2 bonus to all concentration checks.

Armor.name: Enforcer's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants a +1 dodge bonus to AC, and a +5 bonus to unarmed attack and damage. It can be worn only by a monk of Lawful Evil alignment.

Armor.name: Protector's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +5 dodge bonus to AC, and a +1 bonus to unarmed attack and damage. It can be worn only by a monk of Lawful Good alignment.

Armor.name: Arbiter's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +3 dodge bonus to AC, and a +3 bonus to unarmed attack and damage. It can be worn only by a monk of Lawful Neutral alignment.

Armor.name: Unnatural Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +2 resistance bonus on Will saving throws, negative energy resistance 10 and the ability to cast phantasmal kills spell once per day.

Armor.name: Leviathan's Gift
Armor.description:
This robe grants its wearer the ability to cast up to six spells per day that are empowered as though using the Maximize Spell feat. It affects spells on 6th level of lower.
All variable, numeric effects of a spell modified by this feat are maximized. Saving throws and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.

Armor.name: Censor's Robe
Armor.description: This robe grants its wearer a +2 dodge bonus to AC and the ability to cast dispel magic spell twice per day.

Armor.name: Robe of False Death
Armor.description: The wearer of this robe gains immunity to critical hits, but suffers a -6 penalty to Constitution.

Armor.name: Valerie's Embroidered Shirt
Armor.description: This shirt grants its wearer a +5 bonus to Persuasion skill checks and a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.

Armor.name: Warpath
Armor.description: This +3 banded mail grants its wearer a +3 bonus to AC against the attacks by humans and elves.

Armor.name: Mark of the Guardian
Armor.description: This +5 full plate grants its wearer Negative Energy Resistance 30, Fire resistnace 10, Acid Resistance 10, Cold Resistance 10, and Electricity Resistance 10. It also grants its wearer the ability to cast searing light once per day.

Armor.name: Onslaught
Armor.description: This +5 mithral full plate grants its wearer a +8 enhancement bonus to Strength and increases their movement speed by 20.

Armor.name: Death Crusher's Full Plate
Armor.description: This +4 full plate armor grants its wearer negative energy resistance 10 and the ability to cast death ward spell twice per day.

Armor.name: Crusader's Mithral Full Plate
Armor.description: This +3 mithral full plate grants the wearer a +3 enhancement bonus to Wisdom and the ability to cast angelic aspect spell once per day.

Armor.name: Bladed Plate
Armor.description: A creature that attacks the wearer of this +3 full plate with a melee weapon, an unarmed strike, or a natural weapon takes 1d4+1 slashing damage. Creatures using melee weapons with reach are unaffected by this armor.

Armor.name: Blessed Path
Armor.description: This +2 full plate can only be equipped by good characters. It grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom and Charisma, and a +4 sacred bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects and poisons. If equipped by a paladin, it also gives her the ability to use Smite Evil two more times per day.

Armor.name: Dragonscale Plate
Armor.description: This +2 full plate grants its wearer acid resistance 30.

Armor.name: Half-Plate of Hatred
Armor.description: This is a +2 half-plate armor. Its enhancement bonus to AC increases to +4 against the attacks of humanoids, orcs, giants and goblinoids.

Armor.name: Chainbreaker's Chainmail
Armor.description: This +3 chainshirt grants its wearer a +5 competence bonus on all Trickery skill checks and a +3 resistance bonus on Reflex saving throws. It also grants the ability to cast fredom of movement spell once per day.

Armor.name: Heavenly Vest
Armor.description: This +5 mithral chainshirt grants its wearer immunity to energy drain.

Armor.name: Gleaming Chainshirt
Armor.description: This +2 chainshirt grants its wearer fire resistance 10, acid resistance 10, cold resistance 10 and electricity resistance 10.

Armor.name: Assassin's Chainshirt
Armor.description: This +4 adamantine chainshirt grants its wearer a +4 bonus on critical confirmation rolls.

Armor.name: Light Absorber
Armor.description: This +2 chainshirt protects its wearer from blinding effects.

Armor.name: Gentle Persuasion
Armor.description:
Upon performing a good deed, this armor reduces the wearer's Constitution by 2 each time, to a minimum of 1. Only committing an evil act can provide relief, removing the constitution penalty and giving 10 temporary hit points instead. Unequipping this armor is only possible after casting remove curse on the wearer and passing a DC 33 caster level check.
The wearer also gets a +6 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, +10 competence bonus on Stealth checks and allows the wearer to cast dominate person once per day (DC 22).

Armor.name: Python Skin Doublet
Armor.description: This +4 leather armor grants its wearer a +4 bonus to all saving throws against poison, and immunity to trip.

Armor.name: Vest of Mirrors
Armor.description: If the wearer of this +3 leather armor has the Bardic Performance ability, it allows them to use it for 4 additional rounds per day. It also grants them the ability to cast displacement spell three times per day.

Armor.name: Scorpion's Hatred
Armor.description: This +3 leather armor grants its wearer fire resistance 10 and acid resistance 10. It also grants the ability to cast poison spell twice per day.

Armor.name: Sage Armor
Armor.description: This +5 leather armor grants its wearer an additional +2 dodge bonus to AC while under the effects of shield spell.

Armor.name: Ghost Leather
Armor.description: This +3 leather armor grants its wearer the effect of e greater invisibility spell for 2 rounds whenever an enemy successfully hits them.

Armor.name: Burned Protector
Armor.description: This +2 leather armor grants its wearer fire resistance 10 and an ability to cast remove disease spell once per day.

Armor.name: Bombardier's Vest
Armor.description: This +1 leather armor provides its wearer a +2 bonus on attack rolls with bombs and similar weapons.

Armor.name: Archer's Archfoe
Armor.description: This +5 padded armor grants its wearer DR 5/- against ranged attacks.

Armor.name: Second Skin
Armor.description: This +4 padded armor has a +4 bonus to armor's maximum Dexterity.

Armor.name: Jester's Vest
Armor.description: Whenever the wearer of this colorful +1 padded armor casts the hideous laughter spell, its DC is increased by 2.

Armor.name: Blizard's Heart
Armor.description: This +4 studded leather armor grants its wearer cold resistance 25 and an ability to cast cone of cold spell twice per day.

Armor.name: Royal Guardian
Armor.description: This +5 studded leather armor has a maximum Dexterity bonus of +15. It increases its wearer's maximum HP by 20.

Armor.name: Shepherd's Armor
Armor.description: This +5 studded armor grants its wearer a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls with shortbows and longbows.

Armor.name: Stoic Wolf
Armor.description: This +2 studded leather armor grants its wearer cold resistance 10 and the ability to cast beast shape I (wolf) spell once per day.

Armor.name: Reaper's Vest
Armor.description: This +3 studded armor grants its wearer an additional +3 dodge bonus to AC against shaken opponent's attacks.

Armor.name: Mail of Clear Skies
Armor.description: This +5 chainmail has a maximum Dexterity bonus of +5, an armor check penalty of -1, and an arcane spell failure chance of 15%. It is considered light armor.

Armor.name: Armor of Wealth
Armor.description: This +5 scalemail grants its wielder DR 5/-.

Armor.name: Plate of the Beast
Armor.description: This +2 breastplate grants its wearer a +4 enhancement bonus to Constitution and the ability to cast aspect of the wolf spell once per day.

Armor.name: Black Dragon Breastplate
Armor.description: This +5 breastplate grants its wearer acid resistance 30. It can be used by druids.

Armor.name: Breastplate of Afterlife
Armor.description: This +1 armor absorbs 10 points of positive and 10 points of negative energy damage per attack that the wearer would normally take. It also grants the ability to cast daze spell once per day.

Armor.name: Void Mirror
Armor.description: This +3 adamantine breastplate grants its wearer a +4 dodge bonus to AC against ray attacks.

Armor.name: Heart of Valor
Armor.description: This +2 mithral breastplate gives its wearer a +4 morale bonus on saves against fear effects.

Armor.name: Singing Steel Breastplate
Armor.description: This is a +5 breastplate made of singing steel.

Armor.name: Weaver's Chainmail
Armor.description: This +3 chainmail grants its wearer acid resistance 15, a +2 resistance bonus to Reflex saving throws and the ability to cast web spell three times per day.

Armor.name: Blazing Omen
Armor.description: This +3 chainmail grants its wearer the ability to cast fireball spell once per day.

Armor.name: Talwyn's Armor
Armor.description: This +4 chainmail grants its wearer protection from critical hits and sneak attacks. Whenever such attack would be scored on the wearer, with a 50% chance it is negated, and the attack only deals normal damage.

Armor.name: Celestial Armor
Armor.description: This +3 chainmail is so fine and light that it can be worn under normal clothing without betraying its presence. It has a maximm Dexterity bonus of +8, an armor check penalty of -2, and an arcane spell failure chance of 15%.

Armor.name: Tiger's Stripes
Armor.description: This +5 hide armor grants its wearer the ability to turn into Smilodon at will. While in this form, their natural weapons get a +5 enhancement bonus.

Armor.name: Hodag Hide
Armor.description: This +4 hide armor grants its wearer additional 2d6 damage on charge.

Armor.name: Linnorm Hide
Armor.description: This +5 hide armor grants its wearer immunity to fire and a +4 bonus to saving throws against Trasmutation school spells.

Armor.name: Primal Hide
Armor.description: This +2 hide armor grants its wearer a +2 luck bonus on all Initiative and Perception checks.

Armor.name: Owlbeast Hide
Armor.description: This +2 hide armor grants its wearer a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength.

Armor.name: Raging Bulwark
Armor.description: This +3 scalemail grants its wearer fire resistance 10 and the ability to cast rage spell twice per day.

Armor.name: Bonemail
Armor.description: This +4 scalemail grants its wearer immunity to cold and DR 5/bludgeoning.
